name: db-initializer-sqlite3
description: Initialize DB schema and tables very quickly. and Available with the webpack plugin.

scripts.nexebuild: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=2048 NODE_ENV=production ENVIRONMENT=node webpack && node ./nexe.build.js
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=2048 NODE_ENV=development ENVIRONMENT=node webpack && node ./nexe.build.js && node --trace-warnings dist/index.bundle.js -c ./tests/test.json -o test.db
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=2048 NODE_ENV=development ENVIRONMENT=node node dist/index.bundle.js -c ./tests/test7.json -o test.db -d
scripts.build:exe: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=2048 NODE_ENV=development ENVIRONMENT=node npm run build && pkg . --out-path dist

author: nojaja <free.riccia@gmail.com> (https://github.com/nojaja)
